Prowess, prowess
When this creature transforms into Grima, Manipulated Mastermind, shuffle your graveyard into your library.
[i]Expiration[/i] – Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, each opponent loses 3 life.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Grima attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, creatures that player controls get -2/-2 until end of turn.
